name: samsung
description: The Galaxy S23 Ultra is a premium smartphone with a stunning display, powerful performance, and an advanced camera system. It features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a versatile quad-camera setup.

name: iphone
description: The iPhone 14 Pro is a high-end smartphone with a sleek design, powerful A16 Bionic chip, and an impressive camera system. It features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, ProMotion technology, and advanced photography capabilities.

name: oneplus
description: The OnePlus 11 is a flagship smartphone that offers a premium experience at a competitive price. It features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a versatile triple-camera system.
